entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Uranium City
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uranium City 8:00 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
Temperature: -23.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -25.7°C
Wind: E 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow at times heavy beginning after midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 31 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:45 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:45 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 24 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:45 PM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
